pageContext.claim: “Rasmussen just announced that my approval rating jumped to 49%, a far better number than I had in winning the Election, and higher than certain “sacred cows.” Other Trump polls are way up also. So why does the media refuse to write this? Oh well, someday!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump focused on a poll that leans heavily to the right. His approval rating across a mix of polls on Feb.3 was 40.2 percent, according to FiveThirtyEight.com. That's the lower approval rating than any of the 12 post-World War II presidents on their 380th day in office.
